Text: Aspect ratio is wrong. Play in VLC with aspect ratio set to '4:3' to correct it.

I had no problem with the aspect ratio on my computer (using VLC, of course!), and my TV has about 10 different settings for aspect ratios (I will make a DVD of it).  The BIG news here is that there are decent, free, English subtitles, unlike some other torrents that send you to a pay site to get the subs.  I have downloaded this film from four different sources and this one is by far the best (and fast - under an hour)!
